abstract: The company said higher oil and gas prices had made up for lower production and rising costs, as the Gulf of Mexico spill continued to weigh on results.
snippet: The company said higher oil and gas prices had made up for lower production and rising costs, as the Gulf of Mexico spill continued to weigh on results.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — BP reported a profit in the second quarter Tuesday, saying higher oil and gas prices had made up for lower production and rising costs.

headline.print_headline: BP Posts 2nd-Quarter Profit, But Misses Analyst Forecast
